text: Futhi uma befundelwa amavesi ethu acacile bathi, “lona akayilutho ngaphandle kokuba yindoda eyithanda ukunivimbela kulokho okwakukhonzwa ngoyihlo”, futhi bathi “lokhu akuyilutho ngaphandle kwamanga aqanjiwe futhi bathi labo abazange bakholwe mayelana neqiniso ngenkathi lifika kubona “lokhu akuyilutho ngaphandle komlingo ocacile”
